text: Maytenus jamesonii is a species of plant in the family Celastraceae. It is a tree endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== jamesonii Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Trees of Ecuador Category:Endangered flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Maytenus jamesonii
